documents.title: Municipal Traffic Regulation Policy 2024
documents.content:
Policy No: MTP-2024-001
Effective Date: 01/01/2024
Department: Traffic & Transportation

Section 1: Speed Limits
All residential areas shall have a maximum speed limit of 30 km/h.
Commercial zones permit 50 km/h during non-peak hours.

Section 2: Parking Regulations
No parking within 10 meters of traffic signals.
Two-wheeler parking zones designated in all commercial areas.

Section 3: Penalties
First offense: Warning notice
Second offense: Rs. 500 fine
Third offense: Rs. 2000 fine and license review

documents.title: Water Supply Guidelines 2024
documents.content:
Policy No: WSG-2024-002
Effective Date: 15/02/2024
Department: Water Works

Section 1: Supply Schedule
Residential areas: 6 AM - 9 AM and 5 PM - 8 PM
Commercial areas: 24/7 supply with metered usage

Section 2: Connection Applications
New connections require property documents and ID proof.
Processing time: 15 working days
Connection fee: Rs. 2500 (residential), Rs. 5000 (commercial)

Section 3: Complaints
Leakage reports: Priority 1 (24-hour resolution)
Billing disputes: 7 working days
